text:
@realDonaldTrump . @realDonaldTrump : “Coronavirus testing is overrated!”

WH staffer: “Sir, your valet got tested positive for COVID-19.”

(Sniveling Coward Donnie in a tirade)
FCK! GET ME TESTING DAILY!  TEST EVERYTHING AROUND ME DAMN IT! PULL MCCONNELL & BARR OUT OF MY ASS & TEST THEM TOO!
